issue.title: Gazebo7 Linking Error with CMake / Catkin - pthreads

content.raw:
I debug the issue until the point on locating the problem in gazebo dependency on Protobuf. Going deeper in Protobuf, ¿@davetcoleman could you please temporary delete [this line in FindProtobuf.cmake](https://github.com/Kitware/CMake/blob/9bd017d20ec4a2f9f4ceb2a39aa764b584026026/Modules/FindProtobuf.cmake#L305) (probably located in your `/usr/share/cmake-3.5/Modules/` directory) and run your build system to check if that fixes the issue?

We have built a lot of third party software on top of Gazebo so it should be related to catkin packages somehow.
content.html:
I debug the issue until the point on locating the problem in gazebo dependency on Protobuf. Going deeper in Protobuf, ¿@davetcoleman could you please temporary delete this line in FindProtobuf.cmake (probably located in your /usr/share/cmake-3.5/Modules/ directory) and run your build system to check if that fixes the issue?

We have built a lot of third party software on top of Gazebo so it should be related to catkin packages somehow.
